OAuth¶

class battlenet_client.bnet.oauth.OAuth¶
static user_info(client, region_tag: str, locale: Optional[str] = None)¶

Returns the user info

Parameters

  • (obj (client) – oauth): OpenID/OAuth instance

  • region_tag (str) – region_tag abbreviation

  • locale (str) – which locale to use for the request

Returns

User Information (user # and battle tag ID)

Return type

dict

Notes

This function requires an OpenID, or OAuth V2 Client using the authorization code flow
